## Benchmark 1: Clinical association with IGHV and trisomy 12

```{r}
suppressMessages(library("MultiAssayExperiment"))
suppressMessages(library("BloodCancerMultiOmics2017"))
suppressMessages(library("pheatmap"))
suppressMessages(library("ggplot2"))
```

```{r}
load("../results/WeightsList.Rdata")
```

```{r}
load("../results/FactorsList.Rdata")
```

```{r}
data(lpdAll, patmeta, drugs, package = "BloodCancerMultiOmics2017")
```

```{r}
clinicalData <- extractMetadata(lpdCLL, patmeta, drugs)
```

```{r}
factorsList = lapply(factorsList, function(g) {
  indices = match(rownames(clinicalData), rownames(g))
  return(g[indices, ])
})
```

```{r}
save(clinicalData, file = "../results/ClinicalData.Rdata")
save(factorsList, file = "results/UpdatedFactorsList.Rdata")
```

```{r}
source("../scripts/HelperForTheCourse.R")
visualizeWeightsHeatmap(MOFAweights, 'Mutations')
visualizeWeightsHeatmap(JIVEweights, 'Mutations')
visualizeWeightsHeatmap(MCIAweights, 'Mutations')
```

```{r}
plotTopWeightsUsingSeparateWeightsAndFactors(weightsList[["MCIA"]], "Mutations", factor = 7, nfeatures = 10)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data.frame(MOFAfactors)[match(rownames(clinicalData), rownames(MOFAfactors)), ], aes(x = LF1, y = LF2, colour = factor(clinicalData$IGHV), shape = factor(clinicalData$trisomy12))) +
  geom_point()
```
```{r}
ggplot(data.frame(JIVEfactors)[match(rownames(clinicalData), rownames(JIVEfactors)), ], aes(x = LF1, y = LF2, colour = factor(clinicalData$IGHV), shape = factor(clinicalData$trisomy12))) +
  geom_point()
```
```{r}
ggplot(data.frame(MCIAfactors)[match(rownames(clinicalData), rownames(MCIAfactors)), ], aes(x = LF1, y = LF3, colour = factor(clinicalData$IGHV), shape = factor(clinicalData$trisomy12))) +
  geom_point()
```

```{r}
ggplot(data.frame(MCIAfactors)[match(rownames(clinicalData), rownames(MCIAfactors)), ], aes(x = LF2, y = LF3, colour = factor(clinicalData$IGHV), shape = factor(clinicalData$trisomy12))) +
  geom_point()
```
